summary: The diff shows modifications to MessageInput.tsx that implement the redesigned chat input with rounded-full buttons and auto-expanding textarea. All three requirements appear to be addressed: REQ-1 (styled design with specified buttons and textarea), REQ-2 (preserved media functionality), and REQ-3 (send button enabled only when text is entered). The component structure includes image upload, microphone, textarea, and send button with the specified styling classes.
